level.text: 105.1 All meetings of the Board at which action of any kind is taken shall bepen to the public, and no official action shall be effective unless taken atuch meeting.

105.2 A written transcript shall be kept for all such meetings and shall beade available to the public during normal business hours of the Authority.opies of such written transcripts or copies of such transcriptions shall bevailable, upon request, to the public at a reasonable cost.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 3816, 3818 (June 12, 1998); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10919, 10921 (November 19,010); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8953 (June 14, 2013).
